info.name: Tiny Douban
info.description: Tiny Douban is a simple customized style for [Douban](http://www.douban.com).
info.additionalInfo: #Changelog ###1.2 Nov 24th, 2014 - add style for douban moment. ###1.1 March 27th, 2014 - almost changed everything. ###1.0 March 24th, 2014 - first release of Tiny Douban.

obsolete.message: It's deprecated, please use other styles.
